name: Weather Wizard (AmadeusK525)
description:
Weather Wizard sees our favorite Wizard going through platforms to reach his objective: a Portal. He has 4 wands that can change the weather to Summer, Fall, Winter and Spring. The magic blocks in the platforms are tied to the weather and will only help you in their preferred Season...

Hot blocks - only solid in Summer

Cold blocks - only solid in Winter

Wind blocks - only blow strongly in Fall

Flower blocks - only climbable in Spring

Have fun and make sure to collect all books! There are 50 of them.

(Press Escape to see controls)

Art by Cornbread. Please give him some love!
